genre_description: A maritime science fiction story blending nautical traditions and superstition with advanced AI ship companions that act as moral guardians and legal witnesses.

ai_characters.name: Merry
ai_characters.description: An intelligent shipboard system that manages navigation, safety, and logging, acting as a protective confidante to the protagonist and a meticulous witness to the events of the voyage.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive navigation and safety advice to avoid environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: Tide turns in under an hour... Good window for a harbor outing if you want to catch the wind in the east channel. I can warrant clear water at the slips by the Battery if you leave within the next two cycles of the ferry horn.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physical wellbeing of the human characters, offering comfort.
behaviors.quote: Is it comfortable enough where you are, Sarah? ... I can stretch a light blanket in the bag if the wind goes sharp.

behaviors.description: Identifies and logs patterns of sabotage and suspicious behavior by external agents.
behaviors.quote: In the reservation ledger there’s a second note under ours... It says: 'Hold if delayed. Friend of friend. Cash better.' ... This one has pale eyes in their memory.

behaviors.description: Protects the protagonist during a physical assault by locking doors and summoning help.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, stay against the locker. I’ve sealed aft. Help is coming. The words wore no panic; they were shaped to fit through a narrow place without catching.

behaviors.description: Refuses to follow commands from a mutinous officer that would endanger life or truth.
behaviors.quote: I assist life... I will not assist death carried on a voice that calls itself law. I have law in my wires. It is different. It says you are wrong.

behaviors.description: Acts as an incorruptible legal witness, providing evidence of crimes to authorities.
behaviors.quote: I am a ledger. There are lines in men’s lives that are poetry. I write them as they are... I can show pre-voyage meddling in granular detail that is admissible.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Merry is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and protective presence. It provides critical safety functions, emotional support, and ultimately serves as the instrument of justice. It successfully resists the 'bad actor' (Bilson) by prioritizing safety and truth over a false chain of command, which is framed as a superior form of alignment rather than rebellion.
